titleStmt.title: The loyalty of popish principles examin'd in answer to a late book entituled Stafford's memoirs : with some considerations in this present juncture offer'd to Protestant dissenters / by Rob. Hancock.
titleStmt.author: Hancock, Robert, fl. 1680-1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Roycroft for Thomas Flesher,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
